TopicTitle: (Company) Hanland Areonautics Division. (hiring and accepting designs)

Articles.Content:
greetings, fellow designers and pilots. as we all know, the great Hanland Kerman desires greatly to stop the evil Spiritwolf cooperation from space domination, and as we failed on serval attempts, we, the Hanland Areonautics division requires your help. we accept:

Fighters

Frigates

Destroyers

Carriers

Coverettes

Stealth ships

Weaponery systems

Aid ships

Salvager ships

Space stations(war purpose in any way)

these ships will be submitted to Macey dean, to assist the war effort against the evil spiritwolf. we, the hanland cooperation shall win the war, and bring the long lost liberty and freedom to kerbinkind. we, shall destroy the tyranny of the spiritwolf company. ALL HAIL HANLAND!!!!!!!!!!!

(submission: develop the ships in this thread, discussion and improvement and opinion goes here, and the final submission goes into the official submission thread. )when submitting your thread, please go to the official one. this is not an official thread.

P.s. format your submission to the official submission's format. thankyou:cool:

Dennislinux, Hanland H.L.D. Medusa First mate (currently working in Hanland HighCom facility)
p.s. we are hiring to produce our own ships to increase the war effort. if interested, please post hiring request here

So, wait, I'm supposed to post here and not in the other thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/37169-Spiritwolf-Hanland-Submissions

This is very confusing...
i mean, you are supposed to develop and improve hanland ships here. then, post the perfected ship there
Why wouldn't I just do that in the other thread since I'm going to post over there anyway? I am very confused by this thread...

And since the other thread also does not belong to Macey... does anyone know if the series is actually going to be continued? Or if he actually needs designs at all?

Rune. Manage your expectations.

Contains 1 exterior docking port for docking to carriers, 4 docking ports to insert missiles, and 6563.77 m/s of delta-v.

http://www./view/aspolg73pcbsa44/Benith_Fighter.craft

He said in a video recently to email him, and that he'll post a forum thread about submissions himself at some point. (Ie neither of the threads at the moment are his, and I also doubt he'll take ships from them, he still might but I doubt it)
